name: Fracture Hell
description:
Fracture Hell is a replayable high score shooter with a focus on speed, destruction, and customizing your build. You can choose between 5 different classes to find the perfect playstyle for you. Each class has unique stats, guns, and a powerful ability ranging from dashing to a drone spawning healing area. Unlock them and try them out to find a way to beat your current high score in 2 different game modes.

ENDLESS MODE

  • Fight off increasingly difficult waves of enemies to earn power cores to upgrade your gear.
  • Ammo and power core resources are spawned randomly. Pick them up to stay in the fight!
  • You can upgrade your gear at a certain interval.
  • Delaying upgrading increases your power core multiplier at the risk of dying.

    ARENA MODE

  • You have to beat premade arenas as fast as you can.
  • You receive power cores based on how fast you beat the arena.
  • If you are not fast enough you have to retry the arena.

    FEATURES

  • 5 different classes - each with 1 unique ability, main gun, and power gun
  • 20+ Different Enemies to discover
  • Elite and Boss modifiers for each enemy
  • 2 Game Modes (Endless and Arena)
  • 2 Game Mode Modifiers (Hardcore and Ironman) to increase the difficulty for a higher score gain
